file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 36-11-06-04 - FAN AIR CONTROL THERMOSTAT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL FAN AIR CONTROL THERMOSTAT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the LH/RH fan-air control thermostat. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY PRE-MOD S.B. FAN-AIR CONTROL THERMOSTAT - RE- 145-36-0009, REVISION 36-11-06-000-801-A MOVAL 1 PRE-MOD S.B. FAN-AIR CONTROL THERMOSTAT - IN- 145-36-0009, REVISION 36-11-06-400-801-A STALLATION 1 POST-MOD S.B. FAN-AIR CONTROL THERMOSTAT - RE- 145-36-0009, REVISION 36-11-06-000-802-A MOVAL 1 POST-MOD S.B. FAN-AIR CONTROL THERMOSTAT - IN- 145-36-0009, REVISION 36-11-06-400-802-A STALLATION 1 POST-MOD S.B. FAN-AIR CONTROL THERMOSTAT - RE- 145-36-0009, REVISION 36-11-06-000-803-A MOVAL 1 POST-MOD S.B. FAN-AIR CONTROL THERMOSTAT - IN- 145-36-0009, REVISION 36-11-06-400-803-A STALLATION 1 EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 36-11-06 Page 1 of 16 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 36-11-06-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: PRE-MOD S.B. 145-36-0009, REVISION 1 2. FAN-AIR CONTROL THERMOSTAT - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the instructions to remove the LH/RH fan-air control thermostat. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-43-00/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION S.B.145-36-0009 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 414 414CB LH pylon 414 414DB LH pylon 424 424CB RH pylon 424 424DB RH pylon D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task At the LH/RH pylons I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-008-A (1) Remove access panels 414CB and 424CB ( AMM MPP 06-43-00/100) for aircraft PRE-MOD S.B.145-36-0009. (2) Remove access panels 414DB and 424DB ( AMM MPP 06-43-00/100) for aircraft POST-MOD S.B.145-36-0009. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 36-11-06 Page 2 of 16 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-008-A WARNING: DO NOT TOUCH THE BLEED-AIR SYSTEM DUCTS OR COMPONENTS IMMEDIATELY AFTER THE ENGINE OR APU STOPS, BECAUSE OF THE HIGH BLEED-AIR TEMPERATURE. (1) Remove the tube (2). (2) Remove the bolts (6). (3) Remove the washers (4). (4) Remove the nuts (3). (5) Remove the fan-air control thermostat (1). (6) Remove and discard the O-ring (5). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 36-11-06 Page 3 of 16 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 36-11-06-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: PRE-MOD S.B. 145-36-0009, REVISION 1 3. FAN-AIR CONTROL THERMOSTAT - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the instructions to install the LH/RH fan-air control thermostat. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION 36-11-06 - AMM MPP 06-43-00/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION AMM TASK 36-00-00-700-803-A/500 AIR BLEED SYSTEM - OPERATIONAL TEST S.B.145-36-0009 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 414 414CB LH pylon 414 414DB LH pylon 424 424CB RH pylon 424 424DB RH pylon D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expendable Parts IPC REFERENCE ITEM QTY (VENDOR REFERENCE) O-ring 36-11-06 2 H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task At the RH/LH pylons I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the O-ring (5). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 36-11-06 Page 5 of 16 Rev 51 - Oct 31/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Install the fan-air control thermostat (1). (3) Install the bolts (6). (4) Install the washers and nuts (4) (3). (5) Install the tube (2). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Do the operational test of the LH or RH air bleed system ( AMM TASK 36-00-00-700-803-A/500). (2) Install access panels 414CB and 424CB ( AMM MPP 06-43-00/100) for aircraft PRE- MOD S.B.145-36-0009. (3) Install access panels414DB and 424DB ( AMM MPP 06-43-00/100) for aircraft POST- MOD S.B.145-36-0009. General (1) This task gives the instructions to remove the LH/RH fan-air control thermostat. B. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A (1) Remove floor panels 271AF and 272AF (AMM MPP 06-41-02/100 and AMM TASK 53-01-03-000-801-A/400). J. Removal (Figure 402) SUBTASK 020-003-A WARNING: DO NOT TOUCH THE BLEED-AIR SYSTEM DUCTS OR COMPONENTS IMMEDIATELY AFTER THE ENGINE OR APU STOPS, BECAUSE OF THE HIGH BLEED-AIR TEMPERATURE. (1) Remove the hose (8). (2) Remove the fitting (9). (3) Remove and discard the ring (10). (4) Remove the tube (3). (5) Remove the damper (2). (6) Remove the fitting (12). (7) Remove and discard the O-ring (11). (8) Remove the bolts (7). (9) Remove the nuts and washers (6) (5). (10) Remove the fan-air control thermostat (1). (11) Remove and discard the O-ring (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 36-11-06 Page 8 of 16 Rev 53 - Oct 31/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: POST-MOD S.B. 145-36-0009, REVISION 1 Fan-Air Control Thermostat - Removal/Installation Figure 402 A B ZONE 171 172 DET. A 2 3 2. HOSE 2 3 1. FAN-AIR CONTROL 12. FITTING THERMOSTAT 9. FITTING 11. O’ RING 10. RING 8. HOSE 3. TUBE 7. BOLT (4) 1 4. O’ RING 2. DAMPER DET. B (TYP) DET. B (TYP.) 5. WASHER (4) 6. NUT (4) 1 THERMOSTAT WITH DAMPER 2 GREASE 3 TORQUE: 5.6 - 7.3 N.m (50 - 65 lb.in) EM145AMM360092C.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 36-11-06 Page 9 of 16 Rev 53 - Oct 31/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 36-11-06-400-802-A EFFECTIVITY: POST-MOD S.B. 145-36-0009, REVISION 1 5. FAN-AIR CONTROL THERMOSTAT - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the instructions to install the LH/RH fan-air control thermostat. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION 36–11–06 - AMM MPP 06-41-02/100 - AMM TASK 36-00-00-700-803-A/500 AIR BLEED SYSTEM - OPERATIONAL TEST BAGGAGE-COMPARTMENT FLOOR PANELS - IN- AMM TASK 53-01-03-400-801-A/400 STALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION LH floor panel of the baggage compart- 271 271AF ment RH floor panel of the baggage compart- 272 272AF ment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) GGA80TF/B Grease AR G. Expendable Parts IPC REFERENCE ITEM QTY (VENDOR REFERENCE) O-ring 36–11–06 02 Ring 36–11–06 01 H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Inside the baggage compartment EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-802-A/400 36-11-06 Page 10 of 16 Rev 53 - Oct 31/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Installation (Figure 402) SUBTASK 420-003-A (1) Install the O-ring (4). (2) Install the fan-air control thermostat (1). (3) Install the bolts (7). (4) Install the washers and nuts (5) (6). (5) Lubricate fitting (12) with grease PN GGA80TF/B. (6) Install fitting (12) and new O-ring (11). (7) Apply torque of 5.6 - 7.3 N.m (50-65 lb.in) to the fitting (12) connected to the fan-air control thermostat (1). (8) Install the damper (2). (9) Install the tube (3). (10) Lubricate fitting (9) with grease PN GGA80TF/B. (11) Install fitting (9) and ring (10). (12) Apply torque of 5.6 - 7.3 N.m (50-65 lb.in) to the fitting (9) connected to the fan-air control thermostat (1). (13) Install the hose (8). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-003-A (1) Do the operational test of the LH or RH air bleed system ( AMM TASK 36-00-00-700-803-A/500). (2) Install floor panels 271AF and 272AF (AMM MPP 06-41-02/100 and AMM TASK 53-01-03-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-802-A/400 36-11-06 Page 11 of 16 Rev 53 - Oct 31/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

General (1) This task gives the instructions to remove the LH/RH fan-air control thermostat. B. Preparation SUBTASK 841-004-A (1) Remove floor panels 271AF and 272AF (AMM MPP 06-41-02/100 and AMM TASK 53-01-03-000-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-803-A/400 36-11-06 Page 12 of 16 Rev 53 - Oct 31/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Removal (Figure 403) SUBTASK 020-004-A WARNING: DO NOT TOUCH THE BLEED-AIR SYSTEM DUCTS OR COMPONENTS IMMEDIATELY AFTER THE ENGINE OR APU STOPS, BECAUSE OF THE HIGH BLEED-AIR TEMPERATURE. (1) Remove the hoses (8) and (2). (2) Remove the fittings (9) and (12). (3) Remove and discard the ring (10) and O-ring (11). (4) Remove the bolts (7). (5) Remove the restrictor (3). (6) Remove the nuts (6) and washers (5). (7) Remove the fan-air control thermostat (1). (8) Remove and discard the O-ring (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-803-A/400 36-11-06 Page 13 of 16 Rev 53 - Oct 31/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Installation (Figure 403) SUBTASK 420-004-A (1) Install the O-ring (4). (2) Install the fan-air control thermostat (1). (3) Install the bolts (7). (4) Install the restrictor (3). (5) Install the washers (5) and nuts (6). (6) Install ring (10) and O-ring (11) (7) Lubricate the fittings (9) and (12) with grease PN GGA80TF/B. (8) Install the fittings (9) and (12). (9) Apply torque of 5.6 - 7.3 N.m (50-65 lb.in) to the fittings (9) and (12) connected to the fan-air control thermostat (1). (10) Install the hoses (8) and (2). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-004-A (1) Do the operational test of the LH or RH air bleed system ( AMM TASK 36-00-00-700-803-A/500). (2) Install floor panels 271AF and 272AF (AMM MPP 06-41-02/100 and AMM TASK 53-01-03-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-803-A/400 36-11-06 Page 16 of 16 Rev 53 - Oct 31/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
